title: Why is there still NO option for reporting in champion select?
body:
Why should I take insults from toxic players, why should I suffer from their trolling intentions, why should I be left with no other choice but to dodge and let them be unpunished for their very inappropriate behavior that violates summoner's code?

It's so EASY to ruin one man's day.

replies.body: I can understand having a game ruined by someone, but having your whole day ruined because of someone saying things in a 30 minute video game? Life is hard so learn how to deal with things as insignificant as someone being an asshole in a video game.

I wish they'd add this too. Had a game yesterday where the last pick banned Yasuo and our first pick had him selected as pick intent so he rambled on about trolling and cussing and blah blah, ended up taking Draven top but didn't have a chance to troll due to our bot lane feeding the enemy nocturne 8 kills within the first 10 minutes.

they dont have it becuase of the same reason as tribute. 
Alot of games offer this kind of thing where you report during choosing, all of these games have had a issue where false reports were happening and the bot would just ban them, its unfair.

and riot knew with the current projects they cant do the report thing like PRACTICE MODE or a new skin idea.

anyways riot made reporting at the end of the game so that you would be able to understand them better, for example what if the toxic player has a family issue and apologizes for his words due to his(depression?). 

and i know trolls and toxic champ selecters they are %%%gots.


anyways if you dont understand ill offer a simpler version of this.
